short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track and monitor competitor Google Ads effortlessly, storing ad data for easy comparison and analysis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Google Ads Competition Tracker – The Ultimate Tool for Competitor Ad Analysis

The Google Ads Competition Tracker is your go-to solution for tracking, analyzing, and staying ahead of your competitors' Google Ads strategies. Whether you're looking to monitor ad content, analyze trends, or export competitor data, this powerful extension gives you everything you need to fine-tune your own Google Ads campaigns and outpace the competition.

🎯 What This Extension Can Do for You:

🔍 Track Competitor Ads:
Easily track Google Ads from your competitors, including ad title, description, sitelinks, and more.

📊 Store & Organize Ads:
Save competitor ads to a dedicated dashboard, where you can manage, categorize, and analyze the data over time.

📈 Google Trends Integration:
Quickly check how keywords from competitor ads are trending on Google, directly from your dashboard.

📂 Export Ads Data to CSV:
Export all your tracked ads and their associated data (title, description, URL, etc.) to a CSV file for deeper analysis or reporting.

🔎 Ad Keyword Filtering:
Filter ads based on specific keywords to zero in on the most relevant competitor ads for your niche or industry.

Disclaimer: This extension is independently developed and is not affiliated with Google or any of its associated companies. The software may occasionally contain errors. Please use the data as a guideline and verify critical information independently.

_____________________________________________

Current Release Notes / Changelog:

🛠️ New Export Feature: Now you can export all tracked ads into a CSV format for further analysis.
🛠️ Improved Keyword Filtering: More robust filtering to help you zero in on relevant ads faster.
🛠️ Google Trends Integration: Check the popularity of competitor keywords in real-time via Google Trends.
🛠️ Performance Enhancements: The extension now loads faster and handles large datasets more efficiently.
🛠️ No more automated-savings. You can choose which ads - if there are any at all - you want to save to your dashboard. (Just click the +-button, positioned at the bottom right of your browser)
🛠️ Currently, you are only able to extract/save search-ads from the SERP.
